name: hedera-skills
description: Official Hedera marketplace for AI coding agent plugins - Agent Kit development, HTS system contracts, and hackathon tooling

plugins.name: agent-kit-plugin
plugins.description: Two skills for Hedera Agent Kit: (1) plugin development guide for creating custom tools, and (2) app builder for generating Hedera-powered frontend applications with live MCP-based blockchain interaction

plugins.name: hts-system-contract
plugins.description: Technical reference for Hedera Token Service (HTS) system contract development in Solidity

plugins.name: hackathon-helper
plugins.description: PRD generation and submission validation for Hedera hackathon participants, aligned to official judging criteria
